name: Amalgam (Half-Life 2: Episode Two Mod)
description: Amalgam is a Half-Life 2 singleplayer mod. Somewhere near city 17 the rebels have been trying to destroy the combine communication towers known as relays. Their efforts have been futile until now... You as Gordon Freeman must help the rebels sabotage the combine relays. -INCLUDES- -Explore and fight through 5 chapters. -Custom voice acting and soundtrack. -Dialogue closed-caption support in English -Average playtime of 2 hours.
